content_sub_title: Get 50-80% off EVERYTHING from August 31 to September 3
content_description:
When the start of the school year is just around the corner, that means that it's time to stock up on the essentials like backpacks, lunch boxes, binders, pencils, crayons, notebooks, and more.

Make sure your kids are set up for success this school year by making sure they have everything they need to learn. With our low prices and large selection of school supplies, School Supplies Shop has everything you need to start the school year off on the right foot.
